Add?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"Yes","helpText":"This will add a flag 'isNew' to the record and you will need to write these back to the Object with a Record Insert in the Flow."},"addLabel":{"label":"Add Label","type":"text","valueType":"string","value":"Add","canBeEmpty":true,"helpText":"Label to show in the Add button, if empty, it will only show the icon."},"addType":{"label":"Add Type","type":"radioButtonType","valueType":"string","value":"Inline","helpText":"Specify wether you want to be able to add the data directly in the table (Inline) or with a Flow."},"addFlowName":{"label":"Flow Name","type":"text","valueType":"string","value":"","helpText":"Screen flow name to fire whenever the add button is clicked. A 'recordOutput' SObject record Output variable is needed."},"addFlowInputVariables":{"label":"Flow Input Variables","type":"text","valueType":"string","helpText":"JSON string with the input variables to send to the flow."},"canEdit":{"label":"Can Edit?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"Yes","helpText":"This will add a flag 'isEdited' to the record and you will need to write these back to the Object with a Record Update in the Flow."},"editType":{"label":"Edit Type","type":"radioButtonType","valueType":"string","value":"Inline","linked":[{"field":"canBulkEdit","on":"Flow","value":"No"},{"field":"addType","on":"Flow"}],"helpText":"Specify wether you want to be able to edit the data directly in the table (Inline) or with a Flow. If Edit is with a flow, then Add must be with a Flow."},"editLabel":{"label":"Edit Label","type":"text","valueType":"string","value":"Edit","helpText":"Label to show in the Edit button when Editing with a flow."},"editFlowName":{"label":"Flow Name","type":"text","valueType":"string","value":"","helpText":"Screen flow name to fire whenever the edit button in the row is clicked. A 'recordId' Input Variable and a 'recordOutput' SObject record Output variable are needed."},"editFlowInputVariables":{"label":"Flow Input Variables","type":"text","valueType":"string","helpText":"JSON string with the input variables to send to the flow."},"canDelete":{"label":"Can Delete?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"Yes","helpText":"This will add a flag 'isDeleted' to the record and you will need to write these back to the Object with a Record Delete in the Flow."},"canBulkDelete":{"label":"Can Bulk Delete?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","linked":[{"field":"canDelete","on":"Yes"},{"field":"canSelect","on":"Yes"},{"field":"selectionType","on":"Yes","value":"Multiple Rows"}],"helpText":"Add a selection and a button to delete several at one time. This will add a flag 'isDeleted' to the record and you will need to write these back to the Object with a Record Delete in the Flow."},"bulkDeleteLabel":{"label":"Bulk Delete Label","type":"text","valueType":"string","value":"Delete","canBeEmpty":true,"helpText":"Label to show in the Bulk Delete button, if empty, it will only show the icon."},"canBulkEdit":{"label":"Can Bulk Edit?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","linked":[{"field":"canEdit","on":"Yes"},{"field":"canSelect","on":"Yes"},{"field":"selectionType","on":"Yes","value":"Multiple Rows"}],"helpText":"Add a selection and a button to edit several lines at one time. This will add the record to the outputEditedRows and you will need to write these back to the Object with a Record Update in the Flow."},"bulkEditLabel":{"label":"Bulk Edit Label","type":"text","valueType":"string","value":"Bulk Edit","canBeEmpty":true,"helpText":"Label to show in the Bulk Edit button, if empty, it will only show the icon."},"inlineSave":{"label":"Save Enabled?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"Yes","helpText":"If enabled, a Save button will appear in the table to be able to save the changes. If disabled the outputs will be send back to the flow and the user will need to do the saving."},"saveLabel":{"label":"Save Label","type":"text","valueType":"string","value":"Save","canBeEmpty":true,"helpText":"Label to show in the Save button if inline save is enabled."},"navigateNextAfterSave":{"label":"Navigate Next after Save?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","helpText":"If enabled, after clicking Save it will execute the Next button navigation of the screen and it will output the variable 'saveAndNext' = true."},"listenToPlatformEvent":{"label":"Listen to Platform Event?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","helpText":"If enabled, the component will listened to the OD_Refresh_Datatable__e Platform Event and refreshes itself when there is matching Id."},"platformEventMatchingFieldName":{"label":"Refresh Matching Field","type":"string","valueType":"string","helpText":"The fieldName to use when matching and refreshing with Platform event. This fields must be in the data source collection."},"platformEventMatchingId":{"label":"Refresh Matching Id","type":"string","valueType":"string","helpText":"Variable, Constant, formula etc, that contains the matching id to use when refreshing with Platform event."},"pagination":{"label":"Pagination Enabled?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","helpText":"If enabled, the data will be paginated and a control for the pagination will be displayed."},"pageSize":{"label":"Page Size","type":"integer","valueType":"string","value":10,"helpText":"Number of records to display per page."},"paginationShowOptions":{"label":"Display Navigation Options?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"Yes","helpText":"If enabled, the pagination options: First, Prev, Next and Last will be showed, otherwise just the page numbers."},"paginationAlignment":{"label":"Alignment","type":"text","valueType":"string","value":"center","helpText":"Alignment for the pagination controls."},"grouping":{"label":"Grouping Enabled?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","helpText":"If enabled, the data will be grouped by the field specified.","linked":[{"field":"showRowNumberColumn","on":"Yes","value":"No"}]},"groupingField":{"label":"Group By","type":"text","valueType":"string","helpText":"Field to group the data by. If the field is not present in the dataset then it will not group the data."},"groupSortField":{"label":"Sort Group By","type":"text","valueType":"string","helpText":"Field to sort the group the data by. It can be the Grouping field or any of the summarized columns (if any). Default is the Grouping Field."},"groupSortDirection":{"label":"Group Sort Direction","type":"text","valueType":"string","value":"asc","helpText":"Order the groups ASC (A-Z, 0-9, Oldest dates first) or DESC (Z-A, 9-0, Newest Dates first). Default is ASC."},"groupContentSortField":{"label":"Sort Content of Group By","type":"text","valueType":"string","helpText":"Field to sort the content of the group by. It can be one of the fields being showed in the table."},"groupContentSortDirection":{"label":"Group Content Sort Direction","type":"text","valueType":"string","value":"asc","helpText":"Order the content of the group ASC (A-Z, 0-9, Oldest dates first) or DESC (Z-A, 9-0, Newest Dates first). Default is ASC."},"groupingSource":{"label":"Source","type":"radioButtonType","valueType":"string","value":"Dataset","helpText":"Specify wether you want the grouping to be based on data from the source data or grouping by the picklist options. If picklist, then you can select to show/hide the empty groups. If dataset, then it will only show the ones with data and the records without it as a last group."},"groupingSourceFieldData":{"label":"Source Field Data","type":"text","valueType":"string","helpText":"If the grouping source is the Picklist field data, this is a comma separated string of all the values to group by for."},"showEmptyGroups":{"label":"Show Empty?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","helpText":"If enabled, the groups with no data in it will be shown."},"showTotalsByGroup":{"label":"Show Totals By Group?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"Yes","helpText":"If enabled, a line with the totals by group will be shown."},"recalculateLive":{"label":"Recalculate totals on the fly?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","helpText":"If enabled and Add or Edit is inline, the totals will be recalculated whenever the data changes in the table."},"canCollapseGroups":{"label":"Can Collapse/Expand Groups?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","helpText":"If enabled you can click on the group row to collapse or expand. All calculations will include the collapsed rows, and if you change/add/delete a row, collapse it and save it will still save the changed rows."},"canSelect":{"label":"Selection Enabled?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","helpText":"If enabled a checkbox or radio button will be displayed to allow the selection of the row. NOTE: if Bulk Edit, Bulk Delete or any other Bulk Operation button are selected, then the checkbox will display regardless of this being No."},"selectionType":{"label":"Type of Selection","type":"radioButtonType","valueType":"string","value":"Multiple Rows","helpText":"Allow the selection of multiple rows (checkbox) or single row (radio button). NOTE: if Bulk Edit, Bulk Delete or any other Bulk Operation button are selected, then checkboxes will display regardless of this being Single Row."},"showRowNumberColumn":{"label":"Show the column with the row number?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","helpText":"If enabled an extra column at the beginning will be added to show the number of the row. This will only work if grouping is disabled and there are no summarized columns."},"canExport":{"label":"Export Enabled?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"Yes","helpText":"If enabled a button will display at the top right corner of the table to export the data to a CSV"},"exportGroups":{"label":"Include the groups in the export?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","helpText":"If enabled an extra column will be added to the CSV with the group name. Only works if the grouping is enabled."},"exportFileName":{"label":"Filename for the CSV","type":"text","valueType":"string","canBeEmpty":true,"helpText":"This is the filename that will be used when exporting (without the csv extension). If nothing specified the filename will be dataExport.csv","value":"contacts"},"uniqueTableName":{"label":"Unique Table Name","type":"text","value":"2q74l2rk","valueType":"string"},"objectName":{"label":"API Object Name","type":"text","valueType":"string","value":"Contact"},"isMasterDetail":{"label":"Is Master-Detail?","type":"toggle","valueType":"string","value":"No","helpText":"Is this the detail object on a Master-Detail relationship?. If so, you will need to specify the fields and the values for the parent/s."},"masterDetailConfiguration":{"label":"Master-Detail Configuration","type":"text","valueType":"string","helpText":"JSON string with the columns and values for the master detail relationships."},"masterDetailField1":{"label":"First Master-Detail Field","type":"text","valueType":"string"},"masterDetailField2":{"label":"Second Master-Detail Field","type":"text","valueType":"string"},"sharingContext":{"label":"Sharing Context","type":"radioButtonType","valueType":"string","value":"Without Sharing","helpText":"The sharing context to executes the queries when using the component in record pages or communities. For flows, it is up to the implementation of the flow."}}
